thread.title: Stewart: ‘Not retiring from racing, just Cup Series’
thread.title_full: Stewart: ‘Not retiring from racing, just Cup Series’

title: Stewart: ‘Not retiring from racing, just Cup Series’
text:
Posted: 7:31 p.m. Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015 Stewart: ‘Not retiring from racing, just Cup Series’ By Greg Billing Staff Writer 
The press conference Wednesday to announce his retirement from full-time Sprint Cup racing was vintage Tony Stewart. In other words, Smoke was on fire. 
The three-time NASCAR Sprint Cup champion officially confirmed the secret that broke late Sunday: Stewart is hanging up his Sprint Cup helmet after the 2016 season. He plans to continue racing in different capacities — including perhaps the Camping World Truck Series race at the Stewart-owned Eldora Speedway — and, of course, to continue tormenting NASCAR as the co-owner of Stewart-Hass Racing.
